Paris is the capital and most populous city of France. It is located in the northern part of the country, along the Seine River. Here are some key facts about Paris:

- Capital of France
- Largest city in France
- Located in the Île-de-France region
- Nicknamed "The City of Light" (La Ville Lumière)
- Famous landmarks include the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, Notre-Dame Cathedral, and Arc de Triomphe
